long_description: The Timbuk2 3Way accessory case provides easy and quick access to your smartphone or mini camera thanks to its top-loading design that easily attaches to your messenger bag or pack strap. Made of durable ballistic nylon to ensure lasting use; top flap secures with rip-and-stick tab. Soft lining protects contents from scratches. Stretch pocket on front of case stashes earbuds or other smaller accessories. Rear rip-and-stick closure holds the Timbuk2 3Way accessory case securely and makes for easy adjustment and removal.
short_description: The Timbuk2 3Way accessory case provides easy and quick access to your smartphone or mini camera thanks to its top-loading design that easily attaches to your messenger bag or pack strap.
